summary: A high school girl moves from Seoul to a small remote village, where she is constantly harassed and bullied by the jealous common village girls. In a desperate bid to get back at her classmates, she tries to conjure a ghost to haunt them.
cast: Gyu-ri Kim|Se-eun Lee|Yu-ri Lee|Seong-min Choi|Jeong-yun Choi|Yoo-jin Im|Jeong-hwa Kang|Seong-eun Tak
title: Bunshinsaba
